item.description: Recently I was working on an assignment, that at the start seemed like an easy one. item.title: Mighty Azure portal vol2
item.author: Author
item.description: Providing good billing overview and reports for customers through CSP is still not fully integrated in either MSP or Azure portal. That’s why most providers use 3rd party solutions. Browsing through one of those for a client I noticed strange reports for a month or two. We implemented Azure SQL with Elastic Pool. Great thing with EP is that you pay just for selected DTU and you may create “unlimited” number of databases. But, if you create a new database and don’t add it to the pool, it will be billed separately.

item.title: Mighty Azure portal vol1
item.author: Author
item.description:
How many times did you find yourself in need to do some repetitive tasks on Windows Servers? Since 2006. when PowerShell first appeared, a lot has changed. We’ve been writing scripts, functions, and all the code that could help us in order to ease some Admin pain and speed up things. With PowerShell 2 came PS remoting, so we were able to execute commands on other servers too.

How do you manage certain things today in the era of Cloud? Let me guide you through one simple how-to.
